verbs.description: After a year on the Supreme Court as President Trump 's first nominee , Justice Neil Gorsuch [V: has] largely fulfilled conservatives ' hopes and justified liberals ' fears by refusing to take a back seat . Instead , he has ably replaced the late Justice Antonin Scalia on the bench and in the public arena .

Instead , he has ably replaced the late Justice Antonin Scalia on the bench and in the public arena .
